Modules

config.ctrl_vector_im_2kW

This script configures sensorless vector control for a 2.2-kW induction motor drive.

config.ctrl_vector_im_45kW

This script configures sensorless vector control for an induction motor.

config.ctrl_vector_pmsm_2kW

This script configures sensorless vector control for a 2.2-kW permanent-magnet synchronous motor drive.

config.ctrl_vector_syrm_7kW

This script configures sensorless vector control for a 6.7-kW synchronous reluctance motor.

config.ctrl_vhz_im_2kW

This script configures V/Hz control for an induction motor.

config.ctrl_vhz_im_45kW

This script configures V/Hz control for an induction motor.

config.mdl_im_2kW

This file contains the configuration data for the 2.2-kW induction motor drive.

config.mdl_im_45kW

This file contains the configuration data for the 45-kW induction motor drive.

config.mdl_pmsm_2kW

This file contains the configuration data for the 2.2-kW permanent-magnet synchronous motor drive.

config.mdl_syrm_7kW

This file contains the configuration data for the 6.7-kW synchronous reluctance motor drive.
